title: Web Development Quiz
description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript and web technology fundamentals

questions.question: What does HTML stand for?
questions.explanation: HTML stands for Hypertext Markup Language, the standard markup language for creating web pages.

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to change text color?
questions.explanation: The 'color' property in CSS is used to set the color of text.

questions.question: JavaScript is the same as Java.
questions.explanation: JavaScript and Java are completely different programming languages with different purposes and syntax.
